# The `ObjectSizeOffsetVisitor` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Evaluate the size and offset of an object pointed to by a Value&#42; statically. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Evaluate the size and offset of an object pointed to by a Value&#42; statically.

Fails if size or offset are not known at compile time.

Definition at line 252 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/memorybuiltins-h">MemoryBuiltins.h</a>.

## Private Member Functions

### align() {#a512ec1d3c38a17b21b3fc05c601b0e7c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>APInt ObjectSizeOffsetVisitor::align (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Size, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a> Alignment)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <code>Size</code> according to <code>Alignment</code>.

If <code>Size</code> is greater than getSignedMaxValue(), set it as unknown as we can only represent signed value in <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/offsetspan">OffsetSpan</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/memorybuiltins-h/#l00262">262</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/memorybuiltins-h">MemoryBuiltins.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/memorybuiltins-cpp/#l00735">735</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/memorybuiltins-cpp">MemoryBuiltins.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### combineOffsetRange() {#a255e653eee6dd6ef8aa91c49be8296fc}
